amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete the funding in the bill for the Millennium Challenge Corporation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to amend Title II of the bill by striking the item relating to "Millenium Challenge Corporation".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 41 - 379 (Roll no. 383).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Paul.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 41 - 379 (Roll no. 383).
